dmca.title: [TP-C271155V] Violation of Copyright and Privacy
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:
 
 
Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.
***Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .
 
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Hapeegoh Lucky [mailto:hapeegoh@yahoo.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, August 13, 2006 4:55 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: FW: FW: [TP-C271155V] Violation of Copyright and Privacy
Subject: Re: FW: FW: [TP-C271155V] Violation of Copyright and Privacy


There is nothing on the page referenced to help me with this situation.
I don't even see how what is there applies to my situation. Again, I
ask, what course of action can I take to get my stolen story removed
from there website?

I guess I have no option other than hiring my own laweyer. I'll be in
touch.

Copyright <Copyright@theplanet.com> wrote: 

        
        To Whom It May Concern:
        
        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
        
        Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of
your claim.
        
        ***Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .
        
        Legal Response Team
        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

________________________________

        From: Hapeegoh Lucky [mailto:hapeegoh@yahoo.com] 
        Posted At: Tuesday, August 08, 2006 2:32 PM
        Posted To: Copyright
        Conversation: FW: [TP-C271155V] Violation of Copyright and
Privacy
        Subject: Re: FW: [TP-C271155V] Violation of Copyright and
Privacy
        
        
        What does this mean?
        
        No one will contact me from this company OR
bikermatchmaking.com??
        
        This is a total joke. That information should be removed! 
        
        PLEASE TELL ME WHAT I CAN DO

                (multipart/alternative)
                MIME element (text/plain)
                Please find the issue described below. I have been sent
on a wild goose
                chase trying to find who "has jurisdiction" over the
content on this
                site and so far have just been sent to three different
dead ends. 
                
                It is interesting to point out that the offender,
                staff@bikermatchmaking.com hasn't had the decency to
even respond to my
                issue. 
                
                > -------- Original Message --------
                > Subject: Violation of Copyright and Privacy
                > From: Hapeegoh Lucky 
                > Date: Mon, July 24, 2006 4:28 pm
                > To: CopyrightClaims@godaddy.com,
staff@bikermatchmaking.com, 
                > hapeegoh@yahoo.com
                > 
                > I had published a story on the site
dontdatehimgirl.com. I had
                registered as a member there and was given the power to
edit/delete my
                post(s) as needed. The original copy of this post has
since been removed
                from dontdatehimgirl.com at my specific request. 
                > 
                > You can imagine my suprise to find that
                http://www.bikermatchmaking.com has somehow managed to
obtain this post
                (steal), copy and publish it on their own site without
my permission! I
                do NOT want this post published and it must be removed
immediately. 
                > 
                > The post can be found at: 
                >
http://www.bikermatchmaking.com/dont_date_him_girl_articles.htm
                > 
                > The post is listed under the heading: 
                > 
                > * DatingSite: IM 
                > * Handle: vigentleman007
                > 
                > I find it very disturbing that this site has stolen
this content for
                their own use. There are definite glaring privacy and
likely copyright
                issues surrounding this poor business practice. If this
post is not
                removed immediately I will seek out legal action, as
well as inform the
                gentleman the post is about. He too will surely seek
legal action due to
                this gross misuse and abuse by website. 
                > 
                > I am requesting that MY WORDS are removed from this
site as they HAD
                NO PERMISSION TO PUBLISH THEM. 
                > 
                > Please contact me directly to follow up on this:
home-386-682-3370 or
                cell-386-986-9371 
                > 
                > www.bikermatchmaking.com's use of this information is
completely
                inappropriate and unacceptable. Their site has the
credibility of a Dr.
                
                Seuss, they don't even allow any way for you to contact
an actual
                person. 
                No phone numbers, nothing, just a measly email address
that I still have
                yet to get a reply from. 
                > 
                > Not happy. 
                
                
                ---------------------------------
                Want to be your own boss? Learn how on Yahoo! Small
Business.

<http://www.bikermatchmaking.com/> has somehow managed
